name: Monkey Basketball
description:
This is an interesting VR sports competitive game. You can play basketball as a monkey.

The locomotion is inspired by Gorilla Tag. You can run, jump, and control the ball using only your hands.

The rules are the same as basketball. There are single mode and multiplayer mode. You could not only play with bots, but also play with other players.

This game is easy to play, but hard to master. It maybe helps to actually play basketball.
